channel.title: Art on Refresh Annapolis Valley
channel.description: Recent content in Art on Refresh Annapolis Valley

item.title: f5://imagination
item.description: f5://imagination is a pop up exhibit focused on digital creativity. This one day temporary exhibit features work from digital artists, makers, scratchers, computer scientists, engineers and pretendgineer, hardware hackers, lego robotics warriors, indy game developers, new media innovators, VR and AR pioneers… digital builders of all shapes, sizes, and credentials. Submissions are being accepted until midnight December 13. To submit, fill out the below form (bottom of the page). <p>Payton turned 11 Dec 16th.
